import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Jumbotron, Button, Modal, InputGroup, FormControl} from 'react-bootstrap' function Notes() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow const [notesList, setNotesList] = useState([]); function saveNotes(notes) { const note = { date: document.getElementById('inputDate').value, title: document.getElementById('inputTitle').value, description: document.getElementById('inputDescription').value, } const copy = [...notesList]; copy.push(note); setNotesList(copy); setShow(false); } return (
